task_description: Facing the building to your North-East (approx. 67°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: I need to look up to see the full height of the building since the current pitch is at 0°.
The current view is looking up, but I need to adjust my position to get a better perspective of the building's height.
I am still looking up, but I need to move further forward to get a complete view of the building's height.
I need to look down to see the base of the building for a complete height estimation.
I can see the base of the building now, but I need to look up again to estimate the full height from base to roof.
I have a clear view of the building's top, and considering my proximity and angle, I estimate the height to be approximately 20 meters.
